scripts.buildimgs: echo Create/Update image URIs. && yarn imgdata src/images/ src/scss/
scripts.buildjs: echo Merge and uglify JS files. && uglifyjs src/js/modernizr.js src/js/jquery-2.1.3.js src/js/jquery-ui-1.12.1.js src/js/plugins.js src/js/main.js src/js/error.js --compress --mangle --output dist/error.js
scripts.buildcss: echo Merge, minify, and compile SCSS files. && node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/ src/scss
scripts.buildhtml: echo Merge HTML sections, CSS, and JS files into a single file. && concat-cli -f src/pagetop.html dist/error.css src/pagemid.html dist/error.js src/pagebot.html -o dist/error.html
scripts.cleanup: echo Cleanup intermediate files. && rm dist/error.css && rm dist/error.js
scripts.build: yarn buildimgs && yarn buildjs && yarn buildcss && yarn buildhtml && echo Build completed.
